languages.text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость, но, если дело ваше провалится, нас всех вздернут, а вас Ее Непогрешимость не тронет. Ставки в этой игре у нас ой какие разные".

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Господин|Госпожа}, не сочтите за оскорбление, но я боюсь, что Владайм пытается вас просто-напросто использовать. Даже ваши выдающиеся способности и ресурсы не помогут спасти его шкуру от гнева Инцендии, и он это знает. Вы хотите поставить не просто на дурную клячу, а на ту, что сдохнет до того как покинет стойло. Мой вам совет — не ввязывайтесь".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."
languages.original_text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость, но, если дело ваше провалится, нас всех вздернут, а вас Ее Непогрешимость не тронет. Ставки в этой игре у нас ой какие разные".

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your stakes and ours are massively different."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your stakes and ours are massively different."

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your stakes and ours are massively different."

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “很抱歉，大人，可如果你的计划失败了，我们都会被绞死，而那位正义的女士恐怕根本不会动你一根手指头。你的赌注和我们的赌注完全不一样。”
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉，大人，可如果你的计划失败了，我们都会被绞死，而那位正义的女士恐怕根本不会动你一根手指头。你的赌注和我们的赌注完全不一样。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「申し訳ございません、陛下。もしその計画が失敗した場合、私たちは皆絞首刑にされますが、彼女はあなたには指一本触れないでしょうね。あなたと私たちでは、賭けるリスクが大きく違うんです」
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ございません、陛下。もしその計画が失敗した場合、私たちは皆絞首刑にされますが、彼女はあなたには指一本触れないでしょうね。あなたと私たちでは、賭けるリスクが大きく違うんです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero si su plan falla nos colgarán a todos, mientras que a usted no le pondrán un dedo encima. Nosotros corremos un riesgo mucho mayor».
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero si su plan falla nos colgarán a todos, mientras que a usted no le pondrán un dedo encima. Lo que está en juego es muy distinto».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, aber wenn Euer Plan scheitert, werden wir alle aufgeknüpft, während ihre Unfehlbare Ladyschaft Euch nicht anführt. Für uns steht etwas vollkommen anderes auf dem Spiel als für Euch."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, aber wenn Euer Plan scheitert, werden wir alle aufgeknüpft, während ihre Unfehlbare Ladyschaft Euch nicht anführt. Für uns steht etwas vollkommen anderes auf dem Spiel als für Euch."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Désolée, mais vous devez comprendre que les risques sont bien trop grands pour nous. Vous ne risquez pas autant que nous... »
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."

traits.locale_text: « Désolée, mais vous devez comprendre que les risques sont bien trop grands pour nous. Si votre plan échoue, Son Infaillible Seigneurie ne touchera pas à un seul de vos cheveux, alors que nous, on sera tous pendus haut et court. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Kusura bakmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama planınız boşa çıkarsa hepimiz darağacını boylarız. Fakat Asla Şaşmaz Leydi Hazretleri sizin kılınıza dokunmaz. İşin ucunda çok farklı şeyler var."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but if your plan fails, we'll all be strung up while Her Infallible Ladyship won't lay a finger on you. Your risk and ours are poles apart."
